name: balsa
description: Lightweight JavaScript logging for the browser
author: Rob McGuire-Dale <rmcguir@rei.com>

scripts.size-check:
echo '--- Size check (minified, bytes) ---

index.js:' && browserify index.js | uglifyjs | wc -c && echo 'relays/base.js:' && browserify relays/base.js | uglifyjs | wc -c && echo 'relays/console.js:' && browserify relays/console.js | uglifyjs | wc -c && echo 'relays/ajax.js:' && browserify relays/ajax.js | uglifyjs | wc -c && echo '
'
